title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Pull on High Rise Jean Standard
description: STYLE - One Step pull on high rise jean sits at natural waist with hidden elastic comfort band, FIVE functional pockets and mock fly.
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to basic tee shirts and all footwear from your favorite flats to stylish heels.
LENGTH - This high waist pant comes in a 31" regular inseam, 29" shorter inseam and 33" tall inseam with a 14 1/4" leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda One Step pull on high rise jean sits at natural waist with hidden elastic comfort band, functional pockets and mock fly. This High rise pant goes great with all tops from fashionable to Tee shirts and all footwear from your favorite flats to stylish heels and boots, perfect for work, class or happy hour. The stretch fabric gives you comfortable movement with maximum recovery. Available different color washes Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
